CustomField.description: Ticked when an Contract's Ownership fields are misaligned. Used as trigger for Scheduled Flow.
CustomField.formula: OR( TEXT(Corporate_Type__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Corporate_Type__c), TEXT(Contract_Region__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Region__c), TEXT(Business_Unit__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Business_Unit__c), Owner_Country__c != Owner:User.Country, TEXT(Owner_Team__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Team__c), Creator_Country__c != CreatedBy.Country )
CustomField.label: System: Misaligned Owner Fields
